item.description:
All attendees must RSVP on Eventbrite: http://bit.ly/VyZIwZ

Here is an awesome, free, all-ages event from BNT partners, gdgt! Check out interesting new technologies and stop by our Boston New Tech table to say hello!










 

get reviews from people who actually know.

gdgt (say it like "gadget") is the place to get reviews from people who actually have the product you're looking for. Build your product list and we'll send you the best new reviews of the gadgets you want, and the most helpful questions and answers about the gadgets you have.

As always, gdgt live is FREE and open to all ages. However, if you’re 12 or under, you do need to be accompanied by an adult.

We’ll have gdgt T-shirts or gdgt-branded iPhone cases from Speck for the first few hundred folks, so get there early! There will also be thousands of dollars in amazing gear from our sponsors up for grabs in our various contests.

There will be drink tickets for the over-21 crowd and free soft drinks for everyone.

After you RSVP, be sure to follow @gdgt for additional details and watch for an email the day before the event for tips on the contests and other key info.

You’ll also receive a flyer when you enter with more specific info on how to enter the contests so be sure to read it.

Make sure to invite your friends! The official Twitter hashtag is #gdgtBos.

If you’re interested in having your company sponsor gdgt live, contact barry at gdgt dot com for details.

Media interested in attending our press preview hour from 6pm – 7pm, should also contact barry at gdgt dot com.

Congratulations to our startup contest winner Backupify! Make sure you stop by and visit them at the show.

Hope to see you there!
item.name: gdgt live returns to Boston! (Free Boston New Technology partner event)
